about_the_game:
In project.r.█.█. you will have to infiltrate your way through the security cameras of A███████ S███████’s home, renowned Sanhattan businessman, and scan every possible hint, in order to find out about his obscure activities. Night after night you will have to observe the increasingly bizarre and terrifying events happening at his home to get to the t████.

*Navigate and control the cameras. Immerse yourself into A███████'s home and spy on him and his visitors.

*Full FMV graphics. What you will watch is completely real.

*Scan and save sensitive data about the case, use every hacking tool available to do so.

*Avoid getting detected by solving a series of puzzles. Otherwise, the surveillance firewall of the CCTV system, or worse parties that don't want you to know the t████ , will find you.

*Select and send the gathered data to the private investigator employing you, and be careful of the pressures of doing so.

We hope you the best in this mission, failiure will result in unpleasant and dangerous consequences.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes of sex, violence and use of drugs.

detailed_description:
In project.r.█.█. you will have to infiltrate your way through the security cameras of A███████ S███████’s home, renowned Sanhattan businessman, and scan every possible hint, in order to find out about his obscure activities. Night after night you will have to observe the increasingly bizarre and terrifying events happening at his home to get to the t████.

*Navigate and control the cameras. Immerse yourself into A███████'s home and spy on him and his visitors.

*Full FMV graphics. What you will watch is completely real.

*Scan and save sensitive data about the case, use every hacking tool available to do so.

*Avoid getting detected by solving a series of puzzles. Otherwise, the surveillance firewall of the CCTV system, or worse parties that don't want you to know the t████ , will find you.

We hope you the best in this mission, failiure will result in unpleasant and dangerous consequences.
